text:
기분 나쁜 일도 참 많았을 거 같은데
정한이형은 한 번도 뭐라 한 적이 없는 거 같아요
배달음식 시켜두고 저는 잠들어서 벨 울리면
형은 자다가 방에서 나와서까지 나가서
벨 꺼주고
아침에 픽업할 때
잠에서 못 깨서 맨날 늦는 저를
짜증 한번 안 내고 기다려주고
가끔 숙소에서 숨어있다가
귀신인 척 놀랠 때면 진짜 가만 안 두고 싶지만
(머리가 길어서 진짜 귀신같아 보임)
혼자 밥 먹을 때는 왜 혼자 먹냐고 앞에 있어주고
가끔 제 고향 친구나 동료 들을 데려오는 날에는
항상 반갑게 맞이해주고
옆에서 자리해 주면서
저희 얘기를 꼭 들어주고 자기 방으로 들어가요
그래서 제 주변에서도 정한이형을 다 좋아해요
주기적으로 정한이형 안부를 묻고
보고 싶다고 찾아오는 사람도 많답니다ㅎ
정한이형 복무 시작일이랑
제 출국 날이 하필 겹쳐서
인사를 못하고 가서
따로 편지를 남기는데
진짜 완전히 떠나는 것도 아닌데
이상하게 뭉클하더라고요
진짜 돌아보면 고마운 게 너무 많고
또 미안한 것도 많아서 그런가 봐요
trans:
I think there must have been a lot of unpleasant things, too
But I don't think Jeonghan ever said anything
I ordered delivery food and I fell asleep, so when the bell rang,
he even came out of his room while sleeping,
and turned the bell off
When he pick me up in the morning
I'm always late because I can't wake up
He doesn't get annoyed and wait for me
And sometimes he hid in the dorm
and pretended to be a ghost and made me surprised, and I don't want to let him be without punishment really but
(his hair is long so he really looks like a ghost)
When I eat alone, he asks why I eat alone and stay in front of me
Sometimes, when I bring my hometown friends or colleagues,
he always welcomes us warmly and
While sitting next to us
He listens to our stories and then goes to his room.
That's why everyone around me likes Jeonghan.
They periodically ask how Jeonghan is doing
There are a lot of people who come to see him because they miss him haha
Jeonghan's military service start date
and my departure date just happened to coincide,
so I couldn't say goodbye and went
I left a letter separately
even though I'm not leaving really
It was strangely touching
Looking back, there are so many things I'm thankful for
Also, I guess it's because there are many things I'm sorry about
